Kinesis.name: Kinesis
Kinesis.desc: The beginner approach of flailing your arms around! @ Gives 1 Divinity and 1 EXP per hour

Chakra.name: Chakra
Chakra.desc: Keep your internal wheel rotating at all times! @ Gives 2 Divinity and 2 EXP per hour

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.desc: Block out all unwanted stimulus and information!  @ Gives 4 Divinity and 1 EXP per hour

Mantra.name: Mantra
Mantra.desc: One for all, one for all, one for all... @ Gives 1 EXP to ALL characters per hour

Vitalic.name: Vitalic
Vitalic.desc: Open your heart and grow as a player! @ Gives 2 Divinity and 7 EXP per hour

TranQi.name: TranQi
TranQi.desc: Exude raw tranquility at all times! @ Gives 3 EXP per hour even when not meditating

Zen.name: Zen
Zen.desc: Find inner peace and become one with the divine! @ Gives 8 Divinity and 8 EXP per hour

Mindful.name: Mindful
Mindful.desc: Feel connected to every atom of the universe! @ Gives 15 Divinity and 10 EXP per hour
